snippet: What Tim Phillips, president of the conservative group Americans for Prosperity, is reading and watching now.
abstract: Download interview with Tim Phillips, the president of conservative issue advocacy group Americans for Prosperity, which raised and spent $50 million in 2011 fighting for limited government, free markets and the defeat of Pres Obama; Phillips offers recommendations for books, music, television and food.
lead_paragraph: What Tim Phillips, president of the conservative group Americans for Prosperity, is reading and watching now.

headline.seo: Catching Up With Tim Phillips of Americans for Prosperity
